bibl.title: Mummy Portraits in the J. Paul Getty Museum.
bibl.note: nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul.
The introduction is, in part, a revision of The Artists of the Mummy Portraits by David L. Thompson, published in 1976 by the J. Paul Getty Museum.
Thompson David L., Mummy Portraits in the J. Paul Getty Museum.
Malibu, J. Paul Getty Museum, 1982, 8Â°, [iv]-70 pp., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul.
